item.title: Topics
item.description: I don’t intend to write around agendas; but over the years it seems some recurring bubbles keep floating on my mind. Annual Reviews 2020: 你的下一个应用，未必是程序 2019: 当数字生活与工作相遇 2018: 信息消费——从入门到放弃 Review of… Software/Services Hypothesis Apple News+ RSS 服务对比评测 The Information Yoink for iOS Tiny Tiny RSS DuckDuckGo iOS 11 中的新播客 App 播客客

item.title: Colophon
item.description: About Me Who are you? I’m an editor at SSPAI by day (used to be a transaction lawyer), and a tech nerd through the day. Fascinated with the digital world, I appreciate all the convenience and sparks brought by ether and gadgets. I enjoy facilitating everyday life with digital devices and I’m always in search of methods to improve productivity. That being said, laziness, impatience, and hubris are the virtues I always extol. Personalities MBTI: INTJ (Extraversion/Introversion, Sensing/Intuition, Thinking/Feeling, Judging/Perceiving) Big Five: Openness to experience (3.7/5.0), Conscientiousness (3.4/5.0), Extraversion (2.2/5.0), Agreeableness (2.9/5.0), Neuroticism (2.9/5.0) Politics Self-identified
